examples.example: 生活中虽然会遇到一些困难，但是我们要始终保持乐观积极的心态去面对。

translate.english: Although there will be some difficulties in life, we should always keep an optimistic and positive attitude to face them.

examples.example: 无论前方的道路多么崎岖，但是我们都要坚定地走下去。

translate.english: No matter how rugged the road ahead is, yet we all have to go on firmly.

examples.example: 虽然今天下着雨，但是这丝毫不会影响我们出游的好心情。

translate.english: Although it is raining today, but this does not affect our good mood for traveling at all.
